name: polendina
description: Non-UI browser testing for JavaScript libraries from the command-line

scripts.test:install: for f in $(cd test/fixtures/; ls); do (cd test/fixtures/$f && grep devDependencies package.json > /dev/null && npm i --no-audit --no-fund --no-package-lock) || true; done
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:install && npm run test:run
